property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token with lifelink. −2: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+0." −6: Destroy up to three target creatures and/or other planeswalkers. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." - Expedition journal entry

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may enter the city - once the toll is paid."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mausoleum Guard dies, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghoulcallers trying to get in, geists trying to get out . . . . This duty is never dull."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Revenant Patriarch enters the battlefield, if {W} was spent to cast it, target player skips their next combat phase. Revenant Patriarch can't block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sheesh! How am I supposed to make a decent living around here?" - Cabal grave robber

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder." - Knight-Captain Wyhorn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need never remember my past associates, my victims, my mistakes. Innistrad preserves them all for me." - Sorin Markov

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ‘condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it." - Sorin Markov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart - all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card at random. −4: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player. −6: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to any target. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shambling Remains can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Coal Stoker enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, add {R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The day is mine! I sent three such creatures against my foe, then watched as my magefire popped her soldiers like overripe spleenfruits." - Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is disaster, painful and final." - Matoc, lavamancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no heron in the moon! It's a shrew, a five-legged shrew, with a voice like whispering thunder!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme." - Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, how could I know they'd explode?" - Gregel, township militia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent loses 3 life. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not just the wind. It's not all in your head. And it's definitely something to worry about.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Geistflame deals 1 damage to any target. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad pyromancers find their best raw materials in the fury of the dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (Mana cost includes color.) Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that." - Taani, berserker of Etlan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What good is your blade without your breath?" - Greht, Gathan warlord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pained defiance or shameful surrender - every reaction is a pleasant surprise." - Tibalt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the spirit of inquiry, Tibalt applied a battery of agony spells. They yielded nothing on the vampire's whereabouts, but the screams were reward enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({2R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.) Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast this spell. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

property.value: Devil's Play deals X damage to any target. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A devil's hands are never idle.

property.value: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.
